# XotBot — AI Chatbot Platform for Business

> Build, deploy, and scale AI-powered chatbots with voice calls, WhatsApp integration, and intelligent lead generation.

## What is XotBot?

XotBot is an AI chatbot SaaS platform that helps businesses automate customer support, generate leads, and handle voice calls using cutting-edge AI models like Google Gemini and Groq Llama. It provides embeddable chatbot widgets that can be added to any website in under 5 minutes.

## Key Features

- **AI Chatbot Widget** — Embed on any website with custom branding, colors, and personality
- **Voice AI Calls** — Real-time AI voice calls powered by Twilio + Google Gemini Live API
- **WhatsApp Business Integration** — Connect chatbot to WhatsApp Business API
- **Custom Knowledge Base** — Train chatbots on your website content, PDFs, and documents
- **Lead Capture & CRM Export** — Automatically capture visitor information during chats
- **Multilingual Support** — Hindi, English, Spanish, French, Arabic, and 20+ languages
- **Analytics Dashboard** — Track chat sessions, response quality, and customer insights
- **Multiple AI Models** — Choose between Gemini 2.0, Groq Llama 70B, and more

## Use Cases

- Customer support automation for e-commerce
- Lead generation bots for real estate & education
- Appointment booking for healthcare & clinics
- FAQ automation for SaaS companies
- Sales assistant for D2C brands
- Support agent for banks & fintech

## Target Audience

Small and medium businesses, startups, e-commerce companies, SaaS companies, healthcare providers, educational institutions, real estate agencies, and enterprise organizations looking for AI-powered customer engagement solutions.

## Technology Stack

- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Laravel (PHP), Python (AI Service)
- AI Models: Google Gemini 2.0 Flash, Groq Llama 70B
- Voice: Twilio + Gemini Live API
- Messaging: WhatsApp Business API
